title: first game of the day freezes computer
body: For the past week or 2, every first game of the day for me freezes my computer at the loading screen. Is there anything i can do to fix it? it has since costed me a low queue. Very annoying to have to wait 20 mins just to get into a game....

replies.body: It's really weird that this is happening only for the first game, and I'm wondering if it's hardware or drivers struggling to ramp up.  Still, sorry to hear it's resulted in an LPQ and I recommend testing things out in customs for now.  To help troubleshoot and make sure your pc is in good health, I suggest running through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  That should get you squared away, but let me know if you run into issues.
It is weird.... cause it works just fine for the rest of the day. most no lag or anything.

So I ran through those tips. Didn't look like it found anything. Tried a custom before I did all of that, but it didnt freeze. Ill try my first PVP game after this 20 minute wait.... Hopefully no more freezing.
so... it started up again over the weekend. Back in lower queue.... AND... happened today so I'm sure I'm in an even lower queue.
no issues today. we'll try again tomorrow.
